description:
multi-purpose carbon steel hoe, firm and durable, anti-corrosion coating protection, no rust
Carbon steel multi-purpose hoe, suitable for gardening work such as loosening soil, transplanting and weeding
The plastic handle adopts ergonomics, which can reduce the labor intensity and fatigue of the wrist, making you more relaxed when working in the garden
The joint between the blade and the handle is welded with high-strength carbon steel, which is firm
Hanging holes are provided at the end of the handle for easy carrying and storage
name: Garden Hoe, Multi-Purpose Carbon Steel Hoe, Suitable for transplanting, Weeding, loosening and Other Gardening Work…

description:
Prune the branches, leaves and stem of your hedge plants or garden plants to keep them well groomed and enhance the beauty of your property.
Easy Cutting Action
This tool has a long handle that reduces the required cutting effort by 50% to let you cut stems and branches easily.
Sturdy Handles
The handles of this tool are made of aluminium to ensure that they are strong and lightweight.
Hard Carbon Blades
The blades of this tool are made of high-quality carbon steel and coated with Teflon to make it hard so that you get smooth cuts.
